name: Mammalian Cell Antibody Expression (Expi293F)
steps: 1. Culture Expi293F cells in Expi293 Expression Medium. 2. Transfect with heavy and light chain plasmids. 3. Incubate at 37C for 7 days. 4. Harvest supernatant.

name: Protein A Affinity Chromatography
steps: 1. Equilibrate column with PBS. 2. Load supernatant. 3. Wash with 10 CVs of PBS. 4. Elute with Citrate Buffer (pH 3.0) into Tris-HCl Neutralization Buffer.
reagents: Protein A Resin, PBS, Citrate Buffer, Tris-HCl

name: Surface Plasmon Resonance (SPR) Binding Assay
steps: 1. Immobilize HER2 antigen on CM5 chip. 2. Inject antibody candidates at 0-500nM range. 3. Measure association and dissociation phases. 4. Perform kinetic analysis using Biacore Insight software.
reagents: CM5 Chip, HER2 Extra-cellular Domain, HBS-EP+ Buffer

name: Differential Scanning Calorimetry (DSC) Stability
steps: 1. Prepare protein at 1mg/ml in formulation buffer. 2. Run temperature ramp from 20C to 110C at 1C/min. 3. Identify melting temperatures (Tm1 Tm2).

name: VLP-based Antigen Display for Tricky Targets
steps: 1. Express HER2-displaying Virus-Like Particles in HEK293. 2. Purify VLPs via sucrose gradient. 3. Use VLPs in ELISA to mimic native membrane conformation.
